meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lisa Sotir Ozkan Shawn Townsend Rebecca Rider Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6577.

td.p: Lisa Sotir Ozkan, an attorney from Arlington, Virginia
Shawn Townsend, a part-time docent from Brentwood, Tennessee
Rebecca Rider, an office supply sales assistant from Fresh Meadows, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $80,200)

tr.td: THE NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC ATLAS SHRUGGED
(Alex: That's not a BEFORE & AFTER category.)
"AND" BOOKS FOR SHORT
REALITY HITS YOU HARD, BRO
ACTOR FACTOR
WORDS THAT START WITH PREPOSITIONS
CARE FOR SOME WINE?
(Alex: It'll make you feel better.)

Shawn
Lisa

GOOD & BAD MUSIC

YES "SUR"
WHO MAKES THAT?

PONCE DE LEON & FLORIDA

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Shawn] A plug for the Hermitage.)
...
(Alex: [To Rebecca] Sassoon--you were thinking of Vidal Sassoon, and if you go from Vidal Sassoon [Rebecca groans] to an author, you will come up with [*].)
ShawnWho is Jackson?
$4,000
LisaWho was ?
$15,001
RebeccaWho was Sassoon?
$13,000
Gore Vidal')

(including 2 DDs),

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
